snippet: The Obama administration on Monday pledged to the group $27 million in nonlethal assistance.
abstract: Delegation of Syrian opposition leaders arrive in Wasington to plead for more American support; Obama administration grants group diplomatic status and pledges additional $27 million in nonlethal assistance.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration on Monday pledged to the group $27 million in nonlethal assistance.

headline.main: Syrian Opposition Delegation Is Given Diplomatic Status
headline.print_headline: Syrian Opposition Delegation Is Given Diplomatic Status
